mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as typename from application as a join applicationtype as b on a.typeuid=b.uid where a.name like #{name} and (ifnull(#{typeUid},'')='' or a.typeuid=#{typeUid}) and (#{showInMenu}=-1 or a.showinmenu=#{showInMenu}) and (#{forbidden}=-1 or a.forbidden=#{forbidden})
select a.*,b.name as typename from application as a join applicationtype as b on a.typeuid=b.uid where a.forbidden=0
select a.*,b.name as typename from application as a join applicationtype as b on a.typeuid=b.uid where a.uid=#{uid}

select a.*,b.name as typename from application as a join applicationtype as b on a.typeuid=b.uid where a.forbidden=0 and exists(select 1 from userroles as z join role as y on z.roleuid=y.uid join user as u on u.uid=z.useruid join roleapplication as x on y.uid =x.roleuid where u.username=#{userName} and x.appuid=a.uid)
mapper.update: update application set name=#{name} , typeuid=#{typeUid}, iconurl=#{iconUrl}, url=#{url}, showinmenu=#{showInMenu}, forbidden=#{forbidden}, comment=#{comment}, editby=#{editBy}, edittime=now() where uid = #{uid};
